mean_cn: n. 就职仪式，【物理】感应
mean_en: the process by which electricity or magnetism passes from one object to another without them touching
word_etyma: in向内，向上 + duc引导，带来 + tion表名词→induction就职仪式
sentence: The new president is delivering a speech at the induction ceremony.
sentence_trans: 这个新上任的总统正在就职仪式上发表演讲。
